text: This Is Us is an American legal drama starring Milo Ventimiglia as the title character. The show is set in New York. It began airing on NBC on September 20, 2016. It ended in May 24, 2022. The sitcom was acquired by NBC in September 2016 for a complete 18-episode season. The show received a two- season, 18-episode renewal from NBC in January 2017 and a three-season renewal in May 2019. Its last season, which debuted on January 4, 2022, was revealed in May 2021. title: This Is Us
